label: ham
subject: [Ip-health] Re: [Random-bits] WIPO PCDA 4 - Final Recommendation and Proposals
body: 200. These customs then are established among the Babylonians: and there are of them three tribes 212 which eat nothing but fish only: and when they have caught them and dried them in the sun they do thus,they throw them into brine, and then pound them with pestles and strain them through muslin; and they have them for food either kneaded into a soft cake, or baked like bread, according to their liking.
